    This is a joint research project involving the Universities of Milan, Siena and Malta (http://italianpolicyagendas.weebly.com). It aims at exploring the evolution of issue attention in various institutions (media, political parties, parliament, government) and its impact on public policy outcomes using an agenda-setting perspective. It is part of a larger international research network: the "Comparative Agendas Project".
